data.text: Ber bedo jachan ma wuodhe ok nyal cha,
Ok ber bedo gi gombo maonge gi ngʼeyo,
Fuwo mar ngʼato owuon ketho ngimane;
Mwandu kelo osiepe mangʼeny,
Janeno ma ja-miriambo ok notony ma ok okum,
Ji mangʼeny temo mondo oyud pwoch kuom ruoth,
Ngʼat ma jachan wedene duto kwede,
Ngʼatno moyudo rieko ohero chunye owuon,
Janeno ma ja-miriambo ok notony ma ok okume,
Ok en gima owinjore mondo ngʼat mofuwo odagi e ber,
Ngʼat mariek iye ok wangʼ piyo;
Gero mar ruoth chalo gi sibuor maruto,
Wuowi mofuwo kelone wuon mare masira,
Ute kod mwandu gin girkeni miyudo kuom jonywol,
Samuoyo kelo nindo matut,
Ngʼatno morito chike Jehova Nyasaye kendo timo gik mopuonje biro dak amingʼa,
Ngʼat manyiso ngʼwono ne jochan, holo mana Jehova Nyasaye,
Kum wuodi, nikech mano e kama geno nitie;
Ngʼat ma ja-mirima nyaka yud kum, kendo ka ikonye,
Chik iti ka ingʼadoni rieko kendo rwak puonj,
Dhano nigi chenro mangʼeny e chunye,
Gima dhano dwaro en hera ma ok rum,
Luoro Jehova Nyasaye tero ji e ngima;
Jasamuoyo luto lwete malal ei tawo;
Chwad jasunga mondo joma ngʼeyogi tin opuonjre;
Ngʼat mamayo wuon mare kendo riembo min mare
Kidagi chiko iti ne puonj in wuoda,
Janeno ma ja-jar ji ochayo adiera,
Kum oket mana ne jo-achaya,
